EmailTemplate.description: Modification Requests Email notification template by CIA Team
EmailTemplate.name: CIA - Key Modification
EmailTemplate.subject: API Key Modification Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your recent enquiry regarding Australia Post business services.
To help you integrate with our Digital Shipping and Tracking API please access the supporting information in our Developer Centre.
In our Developer Centre you can access:
1. Technical Specifications for Shipping and Tracking Services
2. Sample code for API calls
We have also attached to this email, the supplementary guide “Integrating with the Australia Post Shipping and Tracking APIs.”
When you’re ready to conduct testing please use your unique account number and API credentials (provided below) in our testbed environment via the following URL(s).
https://digitalapi.auspost.com.au/test/shipping/v1/ (plus the name of your chosen API)
e.g. https://digitalapi.auspost.com.au/test/shipping/v1/shipments
API Testbed Credentials
Email-address: *********@***********. ***
Name: ***** ********
Key(username): ************-************-************-**********
Password(secret): **********************
Testbed URL: https://digitalapi.auspost.com.au/test/shipping/v1
Testbed URL (for use with PostMan collection): https://digitalapi.auspost.com.au/test
Products: eParcel and International
Account-Number: ***********
Products: Same Day Services
Account-Number: ***********
Products: ST Premium and ST Express
Account-Number: ***********
Please provide to a copy of the below two files generated by your integration to validate manifest and label compatibility. You may send these directly to customer_connectivity@auspost.com.au.
A PDF Label that you have generated via the testbed API A PDF Order Summary Report that you have generated via the testbed API.
Following validation you will then be granted access to a ‘live’ Shipping and Tracking API Production Key. This will be connected the eligible eParcel or Star Track account which was provided on your initial registration for a “Shipping & Tracking” API key in the Developers Centre.
If you have any queries regarding this information, please don’t hesitate to contact us at customer_connectivity@auspost.com.au
Regards
Lodgement & APIs Team
Parcels, eCommerce and Digital
